member.name: T:SmashArcNet.ArcFile
member.summary: A safe wrapper for the ARC format.

member.name: P:SmashArcNet.ArcFile.FileCount
member.summary: The total number of file entries in the arc.

member.name: P:SmashArcNet.ArcFile.Version
member.summary: The file version of the ARC.

member.name: M:SmashArcNet.ArcFile.Finalize
member.summary: Frees the resources associated with this ARC

member.name: M:SmashArcNet.ArcFile.TryOpenArc(System.String,SmashArcNet.ArcFile@)
member.summary: Tries to create from . Make sure to call before trying to load an ARC.
member.returns: true if the ARC file was opened successfully

member.name: M:SmashArcNet.ArcFile.TryOpenArcNetworked(System.String,SmashArcNet.ArcFile@)
member.summary: Tries to create from . Make sure to call before trying to load an ARC.
member.param: IP address of the Switch console
member.returns: true if the ARC file was opened successfully

member.name: M:SmashArcNet.ArcFile.TryExtractFile(SmashArcNet.Nodes.ArcFileNode,System.String)
member.summary: Tries to extract the uncompressed contents of to .
member.param: The destination file for the extracted contents
member.returns: true if the file was extracted succesfully

member.name: M:SmashArcNet.ArcFile.GetRootNodes
member.summary: Gets the child nodes of the ARC sorted in ascending alphabetical order. These will mostly likely be (ex: "fighter/").
member.returns: the child nodes of ARC root

member.name: M:SmashArcNet.ArcFile.GetChildren(SmashArcNet.Nodes.ArcDirectoryNode)
member.summary: Gets the children of sorted in ascending alphabetical order, The resulting list will be empty if there are no children.

member.name: M:SmashArcNet.ArcFile.GetSharedFilePaths(SmashArcNet.Nodes.ArcFileNode)
member.summary: Finds the files that share their data with .
member.returns: A list of file paths that share this file's data

member.name: T:SmashArcNet.HashLabels
member.summary: Contains methods for dealing with path hashes.

member.name: P:SmashArcNet.HashLabels.IsInitialized
member.summary: true if hashes were loaded successfully by the last call to .

member.name: M:SmashArcNet.HashLabels.TryLoadHashes(System.String)
member.summary: Initializes the hash dictionary from a path pointing to a line separated list of strings to hash.
member.param: the text file path containing the strings to hash
member.returns: true if the hash labels were loaded successfully

member.name: T:SmashArcNet.Nodes.ArcDirectoryNode
member.summary: A directory listing in the ARC.

member.name: P:SmashArcNet.Nodes.ArcDirectoryNode.Path
member.summary: The absolute path of the directory. This may contain a trailing slash. Examples: "a/b/c/", "a/b/"

member.name: M:SmashArcNet.Nodes.ArcDirectoryNode.ToString
member.summary: example: "a/b/c/"

member.name: T:SmashArcNet.Nodes.ArcFileNode
member.summary: A file listing in the ARC.

member.name: P:SmashArcNet.Nodes.ArcFileNode.Path
member.summary: The absolute path of the file or the full path hash in hex if the file name or parent hash label is not found. Ex: "fighter/mario/model/body/c00/model.numatb" or "0x29954022ed"

member.name: P:SmashArcNet.Nodes.ArcFileNode.FileName
member.summary: The name of the file without its parent directory or the hash in hex if no label is found. Ex: "model.numatb" or "0xcb3406d79"

member.name: P:SmashArcNet.Nodes.ArcFileNode.Extension
member.summary: The file extension or the extension hash in hex if no label is found. Ex: "numatb" or "0x6dab89279"

member.name: P:SmashArcNet.Nodes.ArcFileNode.Offset
member.summary: The file data's offset in bytes

member.name: P:SmashArcNet.Nodes.ArcFileNode.CompSize
member.summary: The size of the file data in bytes.

member.name: P:SmashArcNet.Nodes.ArcFileNode.DecompSize
member.summary: The size of the file data in bytes after being decompressed.

member.name: P:SmashArcNet.Nodes.ArcFileNode.IsStream
member.summary: true if the file is a stream file

member.name: P:SmashArcNet.Nodes.ArcFileNode.IsShared
member.summary: true if the file data is shared with other files.

member.name: P:SmashArcNet.Nodes.ArcFileNode.IsRedirect
member.summary: true if the file is redirected.

member.name: P:SmashArcNet.Nodes.ArcFileNode.IsRegional
member.summary: true if the file regional.

member.name: P:SmashArcNet.Nodes.ArcFileNode.IsLocalized
member.summary: true if the file is localized.

member.name: P:SmashArcNet.Nodes.ArcFileNode.IsCompressed
member.summary: true if the file is compressed.

member.name: P:SmashArcNet.Nodes.ArcFileNode.UsesZstd
member.summary: true if the file uses zstd compression.

member.name: M:SmashArcNet.Nodes.ArcFileNode.ToString
member.summary: example: "a/b/c/file.txt"

member.name: T:SmashArcNet.Nodes.IArcNode
member.summary: A file or directory listing in the ARC.

member.name: P:SmashArcNet.Nodes.IArcNode.Path
member.summary: The absolute path of the directory or file.

member.name: T:SmashArcNet.RustTypes.Hash40
member.summary: A CRC32 hash with a specified length.
